Attribute.AttributeName: System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Arguments")

summary.span: 表示 属性。

span.span: Represents a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这表示的架构信息 （名称、 允许的值等）属性。This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a property. 由于这是只是架构信息，没有任何字段如"Value"来获取或设置此属性的值。Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. 如果您手动实例化此类，调用对象的第一个属性设置之前和设置的最后一个属性后。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

span.span: The name of the category to which this property belongs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此字段的值不会不对应`Name`的属性定义中包含的元素类，默认值，具有此名称是自动生成并添加到包含类。If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a element that is defined in the containing class, a default that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing class. 此字段是可选的是区域性不变。This field is optional and is culture-invariant. 如果未指定此字段，此属性将添加到自动生成的类别名为常规 （已本地化）。When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). 此字段不能设置为空字符串。This field cannot be set to the empty string.

summary.span: 获取或设置对命令行构造函数的提示，该提示告知是否在命令行中包含此属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.

value.span: 命令行构造函数对提示。

span.span: The hint to the command-line constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些属性仅由目标，都不包括在命令行中。Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. 其他属性，例如，任务参数，都包含在这些编译器开关/值的窗体中的命令行。Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. 此字段是可选的且默认情况下，具有值`true`。This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.
